name: TicTacToe 3D
description:
It's everybody's favorite game of Tic Tac Toe but with a bit of a challenge!

Set on a beautiful, faux wood board (couldn't afford real wood), the game is played in 3 dimensions. Imagine all of the slices are all placed directly on top of one another. The goal is to get 4 in a row in either the X, Y, or Z directions.

Supports 1 or 2 local players.
